subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Texas Motor Speedway saw its first repeat winner when Jeff Burton, who won the inaugural Nextel Cup race there, passed Matt Kenseth in the final lap.
snippet: The Texas Motor Speedway saw its first repeat winner when Jeff Burton, who won the inaugural Nextel Cup race there, passed Matt Kenseth in the final lap.
